episodeTitle: The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!
episodeTitleJapanese: 闘魚襲来！死の鉄橋を突破せよ
episodeTitleRomanized: Tōgyo Shūrai! Shi no Tekkyō o Toppa Seyo
description: Law's team battles massive fighting fish while crossing a dangerous iron bridge to Green Bit. Meanwhile, Luffy encounters injured Bellamy after Block B, and Sanji faces betrayal from Violet.

events.title: Bellamy Acknowledges Luffy's Growth
events.description: After being defeated in Block B, Bellamy is carried away on a stretcher and encounters Luffy. He acknowledges Luffy's exceptional Haki development and admits that Luffy has not changed his personality, but Bellamy himself has changed. He confesses that Luffy rooting for him has crushed his pride.
events.significance: This marks a turning point in Bellamy's character arc, showing his growth and recognition of Luffy's strength. It demonstrates how Luffy's kindness affected Bellamy deeply, setting up their complex relationship for later events.

quotes.text: You haven't changed a bit, Straw Hat.
quotes.speaker: Bellamy
quotes.context: Bellamy comments on Luffy's consistent personality despite his growth in power

quotes.text: The whole rooting for me thing has crushed my pride.
quotes.speaker: Bellamy
quotes.context: Bellamy admits how much Luffy's support affected him emotionally

events.title: Bartolomeo Discovers Luffy's Identity
events.description: When Bellamy calls Luffy 'Straw Hat' while being carried away, Bartolomeo overhears this and is shocked to realize that the person he's been near is actually his idol, Monkey D. Luffy. This moment sets up Bartolomeo's fanboy reactions and dedication to Luffy.
events.significance: This is a crucial moment establishing Bartolomeo's connection to Luffy and explaining his future actions and unwavering loyalty. It transforms Bartolomeo from a seemingly dangerous rookie to Luffy's biggest fan.

quotes.speaker: Bartolomeo
quotes.context: Bartolomeo's shocked reaction upon learning Luffy's identity

events.title: Block C Fighters Introduction
events.description: The Corrida Colosseum announcer introduces the fighters competing in Block C, including the giant Hajrudin, bounty hunter Jean Ango, the fighting bull Ucy, and 136 other competitors. The block contains 139 fighters total competing for the Mera Mera no Mi.
events.significance: Introduces key characters who will later form parts of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet and play important roles in the Dressrosa arc. This sets up the upcoming Block C battle.

events.title: Hajrudin's Debut
events.description: The giant warrior Hajrudin from Elbaf is introduced as a Block C competitor. He is described as part of the 'new generation' of Elbaf and seeks the Mera Mera no Mi to become the King of All Giants. He previously worked as an S-class mercenary for Buggy's Pirate Dispatch Organization.
events.significance: Introduces Hajrudin, who will later become a captain in the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. His ambitions and background establish his character and motivations.

quotes.text: I'll become the King of All Giants!
quotes.speaker: Hajrudin
quotes.context: Hajrudin declares his ambition for obtaining the Mera Mera no Mi

events.title: Jean Ango's Debut
events.description: Jean Ango, a bounty hunter known as 'Jean the Bandit', is introduced as a Block C fighter. He is shown wearing distinctive cactus-themed attire and is known for throwing stolen weapons rather than using conventional firearms. He has captured numerous Impel Down escapees.
events.significance: Introduces Jean Ango as a skilled bounty hunter competing in the tournament. His abilities and background add depth to the Corrida Colosseum competitors.

events.title: Ucy's Debut
events.description: Ucy, also known as the 'Brutal Bull', is introduced as one of the Block C competitors. He is a large fighting bull with dark fur and long horns who regularly competed as a gladiator in the Corrida Colosseum. He will later be befriended by Luffy.
events.significance: Introduces Ucy as both a competitor and a creature that will become an ally to Luffy during the Dressrosa arc.

events.title: Law's Team Begins Crossing to Green Bit
events.description: Law, Robin, Usopp, and Caesar begin crossing the iron bridge connecting Dressrosa to Green Bit for the Caesar-Doflamingo exchange. They have 45 minutes until the exchange time. Law explains that the bridge has been closed for 200 years due to the presence of Fighting Fish.
events.significance: This marks the beginning of a crucial journey to Green Bit where the planned exchange will take place. The scene establishes the danger of the crossing and the time pressure facing the team.

quotes.text: We have 45 minutes until the exchange time.
quotes.speaker: Law
quotes.context: Law notes the time constraint for reaching Green Bit

events.title: Fighting Fish Attack
events.description: A school of massive Fighting Fish attacks Law's team on the iron bridge. The fish are described as having the head of a bull with fangs, crazed red and yellow eyes, and are so large that the iron bridge bends under their weight. They came to the waters between Dressrosa and Green Bit about 200 years ago, making travel impossible.
events.significance: Introduces the Fighting Fish as dangerous creatures native to Dressrosa's waters. Their presence explains why the bridge has been closed and demonstrates the danger of crossing to Green Bit.

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin questions the nature of the massive Fighting Fish

quotes.text: They're the same as sea monsters!
quotes.speaker: Caesar Clown
quotes.context: Caesar describes the dangerous nature of the Fighting Fish

events.title: Robin Uses Mil Fleur: Gigantesco Mano Spank
events.description: Robin uses her Devil Fruit ability to create two giant arms with the technique 'Mil Fleur: Gigantesco Mano Spank', striking the Fighting Fish with open palms to keep them off the bridge. The technique is powerful enough to repel the massive creatures.
events.significance: Demonstrates Robin's continued development of her Devil Fruit abilities, showing she can create massive limbs powerful enough to combat giant sea creatures.

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin calls out her attack against the Fighting Fish

events.title: Law Reveals He Has Caesar's Heart
events.description: Usopp temporarily releases Caesar from his bonds to help fight the Fighting Fish. After reaching Green Bit, Law reveals he has been holding Caesar's heart the entire time, ensuring Caesar cannot betray them or escape. This explains why Law was confident releasing Caesar.
events.significance: Reveals Law's strategic thinking and foresight in maintaining control over Caesar. This leverage is crucial for the planned exchange with Doflamingo.

quotes.text: I have your heart, Caesar. You can't run away.
quotes.speaker: Law
quotes.context: Law reveals he has Caesar's heart to prevent betrayal

events.title: Arrival at Green Bit
events.description: Law's team successfully reaches Green Bit after Caesar uses his gas powers to fly the group over the remaining distance. They discover a large number of wrecked ships, a giant lush forest, and signs of Marine presence, raising suspicions about a potential ambush.
events.significance: The team reaches the exchange location but discovers concerning signs that suggest the exchange may not go as planned. This sets up the tense confrontation to come.

quotes.text: Those wrecked ships... and that crashed Marine vessel. Something isn't right here.
quotes.speaker: Law
quotes.context: Law notices signs of trouble at the exchange location

events.title: Violet Betrays and Then Helps Sanji
events.description: Sanji defeats Doflamingo's operatives to protect Violet. She initially betrays Sanji by restraining him, revealing her allegiance to Doflamingo. However, after using her Devil Fruit power to read Sanji's mind and seeing his kind heart and perverted thoughts, she is moved by his trust and decides to betray the Donquixote family to help him instead.
events.significance: This is a crucial turning point for Violet's character, showing her internal conflict and eventual decision to help the Straw Hats. Sanji's unwavering trust in women, even when being betrayed, proves instrumental in gaining a valuable ally.

quotes.text: I don't doubt a woman's tears.
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji expresses his trust in Violet even while being betrayed

quotes.text: You really are a romantic fool.
quotes.speaker: Violet
quotes.context: Violet comments on Sanji's nature after deciding to help him

events.title: Sanji Uses Amour Shot
events.description: Sanji uses his technique 'Amour Shot' to defeat some of Doflamingo's operatives who were pursuing Violet. This demonstrates Sanji's continued combat abilities in the New World.
events.significance: Shows Sanji's fighting style and abilities are still effective against New World opponents, maintaining his role as one of the Straw Hat's strongest fighters.

quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji defeats Doflamingo's men to protect Violet

events.title: Violet's True Identity Hinted
events.description: After deciding to help Sanji, Violet warns him that her leaders most likely already know about her betrayal. She tells Sanji to meet her at the western shore, where he promises to ensure her escape. This hints at Violet's complicated position and sets up future revelations about her true identity.
events.significance: This moment establishes Violet as a double agent and ally to the Straw Hats. It sets up the later revelation of her true identity as Princess Viola of the Riku family.

quotes.text: They most likely know about my betrayal already.
quotes.speaker: Violet
quotes.context: Violet acknowledges the danger of helping the Straw Hats

quotes.text: Wait for me at the western shore. I will definitely let you escape.
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji promises to protect Violet from consequences

quotes.text: You haven't changed a bit, Straw Hat.
quotes.speaker: Bellamy
quotes.context: Bellamy acknowledges Luffy after Block B

quotes.text: I don't doubt a woman's tears.
quotes.speaker: Sanji
quotes.context: Sanji trusts Violet despite her betrayal

quotes.text: I have your heart, Caesar. You can't run away.
quotes.speaker: Law
quotes.context: Law reveals his leverage over Caesar

quotes.speaker: Robin
quotes.context: Robin fights off the Fighting Fish

themes.description: The episode explores trust through Sanji's unwavering belief in Violet despite her betrayal, and Law's strategic mistrust of Caesar leading him to hold Caesar's heart as insurance.
themes.symbolism: Violet's tears represent the complexity of loyalty and deception, while Caesar's captive heart symbolizes the price of betrayal.

themes.description: Bellamy's acknowledgment of Luffy demonstrates character growth and the struggle with pride. Bellamy admits that Luffy's kindness crushed his pride, showing how compassion can be more powerful than strength.
themes.symbolism: Bellamy being carried away on a stretcher represents his humbled state and acceptance of change.

themes.description: The Fighting Fish and iron bridge serve as literal obstacles that must be overcome to reach the goal of Green Bit, paralleling the characters' need to overcome personal and strategic challenges.
themes.symbolism: The 200-year-closed bridge represents long-standing barriers that the characters must brave to move forward.

characterSpotlights.development: Law demonstrates his tactical thinking by conserving energy for his fight with Doflamingo and revealing he has Caesar's heart as insurance. His caution about the Marine presence at Green Bit shows his awareness of potential betrayal.
keyActions: Leads the team across the iron bridge to Green Bit
Explains the danger of the Fighting Fish
Identifies signs of potential ambush at Green Bit
quotes: I have to save all my energy for my fight with Doflamingo.
I have your heart, Caesar. You can't run away.

characterSpotlights.development: Sanji's unwavering trust in women is tested when Violet betrays him, but his steadfast belief in her tears ultimately wins her over to the Straw Hats' side. This demonstrates how his seemingly foolish chivalry can be strategically valuable.
quotes: I don't doubt a woman's tears.
Wait for me at the western shore. I will definitely let you escape.

characterSpotlights.development: Bellamy shows tremendous growth from his earlier appearance, acknowledging Luffy's strength and admitting that Luffy's kindness affected him deeply. This marks a significant shift in his character.
keyActions: Admits his pride was crushed by Luffy's support
Inadvertently reveals Luffy's identity to Bartolomeo
quotes: You haven't changed a bit, Straw Hat.
The whole rooting for me thing has crushed my pride.

characterSpotlights.development: Robin demonstrates her improved combat abilities by fighting off massive Fighting Fish with her giant limb techniques, showing she has grown stronger since the time skip.
keyActions: Uses Mil Fleur: Gigantesco Mano Spank against Fighting Fish
Questions the nature of the Fighting Fish
Assists in crossing the iron bridge to Green Bit

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime expanded the Fighting Fish attack sequence with additional action scenes not present in the manga chapter.
The introduction of Block C fighters was more detailed in the anime with visual showcases of each fighter.

trivia.fact: Episode 639 adapts Chapter 710 of the manga, titled 'To Green Bit', released on June 10, 2013.
The Fighting Fish that attack the iron bridge are based on Siamese fighting fish (Betta fish) known for their aggressive behavior, but supersized to monstrous proportions.

sources.title: Animal Species/Dressrosa Saga - One Piece Wiki

trivia.fact: This episode marks the beginning of Bartolomeo's fanboy behavior toward Luffy, which becomes a recurring comedic element throughout the Dressrosa arc.
Hajrudin and Jean Ango, who debut in this episode, will later become members of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet formed at the end of the Dressrosa arc.
The iron bridge connecting Dressrosa to Green Bit has been closed for 200 years, the same amount of time the Fighting Fish have inhabited those waters.
